Welcome to TWSCA's documentation!
================================

TWSCA (Time-Warped Spectral Correlation Analysis) is a Python package for analyzing correlations between time series that may be misaligned in time or have different speeds.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
